languages.text: {n}Двойник всматривается в вашу улыбку. Недовольно. Обеспокоенно. Судя по властному взгляду, он ждет подчинения, но в вас нет ни покорности, ни страха. И этим вы внушаете страх.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Двойник всматривается в вашу улыбку. Недовольно. Обеспокоенно. Он привык подчинять одним своим присутствием, но в вас нет ни покорности, ни страха. И в этом чуждое сознание чувствует угрозу своему господству.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The doppelganger peers into your smile. Displeased. Concerned. From the imperious look in {mf|his|her} eyes, {mf|he|she} expects submission, but there is no submission or fear in you. And this inspires terror.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Двойник всматривается в вашу улыбку. Недовольно. Обеспокоенно. Судя по властному взгляду, он ждет подчинения, но в вас нет ни покорности, ни страха. И этим вы внушаете страх.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The doppelganger peers into your smile. Unhappy. Concerned. From the imperious look in {mf|his|her} eyes, {mf|he|she} expects submission, but there is no submission or fear in you. And this inspires terror.{/n}

{n}The doppelganger peers into your smile. Unhappy. Concerned. From the imperious look in {mf|his|her} eyes, {mf|he|she} expects submission, but there is no submission or fear in you. And this inspires terror.{/n}

{n}The doppelganger peers into your smile. Unhappy. Concerned. From the imperious look in {mf|his|her} eyes, {mf|he|she} expects submission, but there is no submission or fear in you. And this inspires terror.{/n}

{n}The doppelganger peers into your smile. Displeased. Concerned. From the imperious look in {mf|his|her} eyes, {mf|he|she} expects submission, but there is no submission or fear in you. And this inspires terror.{/n}

{n}The doppelganger peers into your smile. Displeased. Concerned. From the imperious look in {mf|his|her} eyes, {mf|he|she} expects submission, but there is no submission or fear in you. And this inspires terror.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu doble estudia tu sonrisa. Está {mf|contrariado|contrariada}. {mf|Preocupado|Preocupada}. A juzgar por su mirada apremiante, espera que te sometas; pero no hay sumisión ni temor en ti. Y eso le asusta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The doppelganger peers into your smile. Displeased. Concerned. From the imperious look in {mf|his|her} eyes, {mf|he|she} expects submission, but there is no submission or fear in you. And this inspires terror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu doble estudia tu sonrisa. Está {mf|contrariado|contrariada}. {mf|Preocupado|Preocupada}. A juzgar por su mirada apremiante, espera que te sometas; pero no hay sumisión ni temor en ti. Y eso le asusta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ドッペルゲンガーは不満そうに、そして心配そうにあなたの笑顔を睨みつけた。{mf|彼|彼女}の威圧的な目つきを見る限り、{mf|彼|彼女}は服従を期待しているようだが、あなたには服従の態度も恐怖も見せない。そして、これが恐怖を呼び起こした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The doppelganger peers into your smile. Displeased. Concerned. From the imperious look in {mf|his|her} eyes, {mf|he|she} expects submission, but there is no submission or fear in you. And this inspires terror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ドッペルゲンガーは不満そうに、そして心配そうにあなたの笑顔を睨みつけた。{mf|彼|彼女}の威圧的な目つきを見る限り、{mf|彼|彼女}は服従を期待しているようだが、あなたには服従の態度も恐怖も見せない。そして、これが恐怖を呼び起こした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}冒牌货凝视着你的笑容，脸上带着不满与担忧。从{mf|他|她}傲慢的眼神看来，{mf|他|她}期待着你屈服，但你却毫不屈服，心中也没有任何恐惧，这激起了{mf|他|她}的恐惧。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The doppelganger peers into your smile. Displeased. Concerned. From the imperious look in {mf|his|her} eyes, {mf|he|she} expects submission, but there is no submission or fear in you. And this inspires terror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}冒牌货凝视着你的笑容，脸上带着不满与担忧。从{mf|他|她}傲慢的眼神看来，{mf|他|她}期待着你屈服，但你却毫不屈服，心中也没有任何恐惧，这激起了{mf|他|她}的恐惧。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{mf|Der Doppelgänger|Die Doppelgängerin} sieht dich prüfend an. Ungehalten. Besorgt. Dem herrischen Blick in {mf|seinen|ihren} Augen nach zu urteilen, erwartet {mf|er|sie} Unterwerfung, aber du hast keine Unterwerfung oder Furcht in dir. Und das sorgt für Entsetzen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The doppelganger peers into your smile. Displeased. Concerned. From the imperious look in {mf|his|her} eyes, {mf|he|she} expects submission, but there is no submission or fear in you. And this inspires terror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{mf|Der Doppelgänger|Die Doppelgängerin} sieht dich prüfend an. Ungehalten. Besorgt. Dem herrischen Blick in {mf|seinen|ihren} Augen nach zu urteilen, erwartet {mf|er|sie} Unterwerfung, aber du hast keine Unterwerfung oder Furcht in dir. Und das sorgt für Entsetzen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le regard du sosie reste fixé sur votre sourire. Mécontent. Inquiet. Son air impérieux ne laisse aucun doute sur ce qu'{mf|il|elle} attendait : de la soumission, pure et simple. Mais l'absence totale d'asservissement ou même de peur en vous semble {mf|le|la} terrifier au plus haut point.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The doppelganger peers into your smile. Displeased. Concerned. From the imperious look in {mf|his|her} eyes, {mf|he|she} expects submission, but there is no submission or fear in you. And this inspires terror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard du sosie reste fixé sur votre sourire. Mécontent. Inquiet. Son air impérieux ne laisse aucun doute sur ce qu'{mf|il|elle} attendait : de la soumission, pure et simple. Mais l'absence totale d'asservissement ou même de peur en vous semble {mf|le|la} terrifier au plus haut point.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kopyan, gülümsemene dikkatle bakıyor. Hoşnutsuz. İlgili. Gözlerindeki buyurgan bakışlar itaat bekliyor ancak senin içinde ne itaat ne de korku var. Bu da ona dehşet veriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The doppelganger peers into your smile. Displeased. Concerned. From the imperious look in {mf|his|her} eyes, {mf|he|she} expects submission, but there is no submission or fear in you. And this inspires terror.{/n}
